HomePage.title: Home Page!
HomePage.description: This is a basic example that demonstrates the usage of next-intl with the Next.js App Router. Try changing the locale in the top right corner and see how the content changes.

Extra-Page.des: We're working hard to improve the user experience. Stay tuned!

Error.Email already in use: Email already in use with different provider!

NotFoundPage.title: Page not found
NotFoundPage.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for could not be found. Please double-check the browser address bar or use the navigation to go to a known page.

Error.title: Something went wrong!
Error.description: We've unfortunately encountered an error. You can try to reload the page you were visiting.

PathnamesPage.title: Pathnames
PathnamesPage.description:
The pathnames are internationalized too.

If you're using the default language English, you'll see /en/pathnames in the browser address bar on this page.

If you change the locale to German, the URL is localized accordingly (/de/pfadnamen).
